content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal preferences or opinions, but according to Yelp and TripAdvisor, some of the best BBQ restaurants in San Antonio are:

1. Two Bros BBQ Market - must trys: brisket, pork ribs, jalapeno cheese sausage
2. The Granary 'Cue & Brew - must trys: brisket, pulled pork, spare ribs
3. Rudy's "Country Store" and Bar-B-Q - must trys: brisket, turkey, creamed corn
4. Augie's Barbed Wire Smokehouse - must trys: brisket, sausage, ribs
5. 4-T's Bar-B-Q & Catering - must trys: brisket, pulled pork, smoked chicken

It's worth noting that they all have their own specialties, so it depends on what type of BBQ you prefer.
